channel.title: Angular on Austin
channel.description: Recent content in Angular on Austin

item.title: 01_项目创建
item.author: austinzgx@hotmail.com (AustinZGX)
item.description: 安装工具 Nodejs npm Angular CLI npm install -g @angular/cli 项目建立 ng new blog-client cd my-app ng serve –open (aliasng serve -o) 常用命令 --dry-run (alias: -d) : Run through without making any changes. --style less : The file extension to be used for style files. NG-ZORRO ng add ng-zorro-antd
